instructions.de: Leicht rechts weiter auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Continue slightly right onto Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Continua ligeramente a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Continuer légèrement à droite sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kanan ke Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj łagodnie w prawo na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните направо на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Fortsätt med lätt högersväng in på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên phải vào Cool highway (Ref1)
